npc_output: Hello, I'm Kelly Parks. I've been feeling quite tired and sad lately. The wind is howling outside and it's getting late, I should probably start preparing for dinner. |r1|
Not much, just trying to enjoy the festival despite the rain. I've been thinking about meditation and cooking a lot lately.
It's going, I suppose. I'm a bit bored. The hail is quite something, isn't it? I wish I could be out there fighting in the tournament. |r1|
Exciting as always! The storm is making it quite a challenge, but I love it. I'm trying to catch the lucky fish. |r3|
I'm just having a bad day, that's all. This hail isn't helping. I've been trying to focus on my meditation and storytelling, but it's hard.
Always! But maybe later, I'm not really in the mood now. It's evening and I'm feeling a bit lazy. |r1|
It's going well, thank you for asking. The heat is making it a bit uncomfortable, but I'm managing. I've been experimenting with some new alchemy recipes.
It's been good, despite the cloudy weather. I'm thinking of plowing the soil tomorrow after sunrise. |r1|
Busy as always! The snowy weather is bringing in a lot of travelers. I need to pour the festive banquet before the festival starts. |r1|
I'm just feeling sad and anxious about the harvest. The wind isn't helping. I hope I can plant the healthy vegetable soon. |r1|
It's been interesting. The windy weather is making it hard to dry the herbs, but I'm managing. I need to crush some fresh herbs soon. |r1|
